Package org.openehealth.ipf.platform.camel.ihe.fhir.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HapiClientInterceptorFactory  
    HapiServerInterceptorFactory  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FhirComponent<AuditDatasetType extends org.openehealth.ipf.commons.ihe.fhir.FhirAuditDataset>
    Abstract FHIR Camel component
    FhirComponentConfiguration
    Static configuration for FHIR components.
    FhirConsumer<AuditDatasetType extends org.openehealth.ipf.commons.ihe.fhir.FhirAuditDataset>
    FHIR consumer, which is an implementation of a RequestConsumer that handles requests by sending the request data and parameters into a Camel route and returning the result of the route processing.
    FhirEndpoint<AuditDatasetType extends org.openehealth.ipf.commons.ihe.fhir.FhirAuditDataset,ComponentType extends FhirComponent<AuditDatasetType>>
    Generic FHIR endpoint
    FhirEndpointConfiguration<AuditDatasetType extends org.openehealth.ipf.commons.ihe.fhir.FhirAuditDataset>
    Configuration of a FHIR endpoint instance
    FhirProducer<AuditDatasetType extends org.openehealth.ipf.commons.ihe.fhir.FhirAuditDataset>  
    FhirResourceValidators
    Factory class for creating validating processors for FHIR resources.
